subtitleNullable: Bitcoin Price Prediction based on News Headlines
descriptionNullable:
## About

**Bitcoin** uses Blockchain concept which is peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority or banks; managing transactions and the issuing of bitcoins is carried out collectively by the network. Bitcoin is open-source; its design is public, nobody owns or controls Bitcoin and everyone can take part. To know more about **Bitcoin** visit [here](https://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/bitcoin.asp).

## Data Collections

Data was collected from a twitter page [BTCTN](https://twitter.com/BTCTN) which is most popular bitcoin news page on twitter using [Twint Python library](https://pypi.org/project/twint/) which bypass the twitter restrictions for not scraping more than 3200 tweets at a time and it does not require any API key to get the data.

## About data

Data contains columns such as 
> date
> price
> headlines as (top_0, top_1, top_2,...., top_32)
title: Bitcoin Price Prediction
